CustomField.description: Used to get weighted average of NPS scores for Health Metric.
CustomField.formula: IF( (ISNULL( Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Saver__c )= True && ISNULL( Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c )= False), CASE((Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c),1,-1,2, -1,3,-1,4,-1,5,-1,6,-1,7,0,8,0,9,1,10,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=True), CASE((Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Saver__c),1,-1,2, -1,3,-1,4,-1,5,-1,6,-1,7,0,8,0,9,1,10,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=False), CASE(ROUND((Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Saver__c*0.2)+(Most_Recent_NPS_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c*0.8),0), 1,-1,2, -1,3,-1,4,-1,5,-1,6,-1,7,0,8,0,9,1,10,1,0),0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to get weighted average of NPS scores for Health Metric.
CustomField.label: NPS HM Score (Deprecated)
